html:
1.17.18  3:13 am   oh no i decided the only thing i want to do is science so i have to do it on my own otherwise it's impossible

     it sounds like you are going to have a good time

1.17.18  3:06 am   who/what inspired your unique style of music and visuals?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

1.17.18  2:57 am   What was your main inspiration for "la de da de da de da de day oh?"

     in 2012 i re-visited a short song i had written in 2009 called 'in the snow' (and the first verse was mostly the first verse of la de da, as you know it) and i decided to re-write the entire thing after the first prechorus, and come up with an entirely new chorus. the pre-chorus was as you know it, about wanting to write a song. so i made a new chorus, with a much more obvious and direct approach, considering the previous line was about wanting to write a song

1.17.18  2:41 am   what's a funny thing to call weed, my man

     dope

1.17.18  2:35 am   Why do you not add new videos to the reality section anymore these days? I quite liked them

     because i've been making other videos instead

1.17.18  2:30 am   You talk a lot about being in prison (the Song Song,
be free and don't sell records, Snail time.) Why is this such an important topic for you?

     i think if are ever in one, it would become very important to you

1.17.18  2:23 am   What is your favourite Beatles song?

     the one where they all loved and hated each other at the same time

1.17.18  2:22 am   So what do you do after you post a video? 

     answer questions, and start on the next project

1.17.18  2:17 am   why can't we be happier?

     you can, but you might get sad at some point too. which is ok also

1.17.18  2:13 am   When will the world start?

     it has been starting this entire time

1.17.18  2:08 am   You write a lot of music with cool lyrics. But I don't think you've ever written a story song, with set characters, and a beginning, middle, and end. I think that could be interesting, though, if you tried it. Would you consider trying it?

     i think i have

1.17.18  2:05 am   Will you ever change the thank you page to have the right spelling?

     think of how boring that would be, the thank you page is already pretty boring. the spelling twist is just about the only thing it has going for it

1.17.18  1:59 am   When will I get La de da de da de da de day oh on Spotify

     whenever spotify is ready to post it

1.17.18  1:56 am   What do you do when you're going through a rough time in your life?

     document the experience

1.17.18  1:55 am   1.14.18  6:44 pm Yet that perspective is acceptable when you talk about music.

     not to me

1.17.18  1:55 am   How do I search for pancakes?

     you could carry around a picture of pancakes, and then check everything around to see if it looks like what you have in the picture

1.17.18  1:42 am   I'm gonna go to sleep

     ah, #relatable

1.17.18  1:34 am   What is your favorite plant?

     the dirt plant

1.17.18  1:32 am   why your last song is so sad?

     i thought it was happy

1.17.18  1:22 am   My girlfriend just broke up with me. How do I get over it?

     get to know yourself again

1.17.18  1:12 am   you said somewhere here that "that it is much much more important to know what notes are relative to each other, rather than knowing the absolute pitch of one note, out in the desert." does that mean you think relative pitch is more important than perfect pitch? and if so, why?

     it's kind of like when you are drawing a face .... it is probably more important to know where the ear is relative to the other ear than to know what the geographical coordinates are of the ear. at least if you are doing drawings

1.17.18  1:11 am   Why is music theory so hard 

     perhaps because you forgot about the music? i have seen this happen to a lot of people

1.17.18  1:09 am   What is home to you and why does it seem to be a hostile/unwelcoming place in your music?

     ? i recall 'home' being mentioned in only the highest regards, any time it is mentioned, which is a lot

1.17.18  1:04 am   How do we end world hunger?

     improve transportation

1.17.18  12:56 am   My door knob is broken, how to fix?

     you're gonna have to get a new house

1.17.18  12:55 am   is the lyric "where did all the good times go" inspired by your first question ever

     no, i wrote that line in 2012, the first question here was in 2015

1.17.18  12:53 am   how weird was it to exploded and suddenly be an internet sensation?

     it was actually quite gradual, and there is still a long way to go

1.17.18  12:50 am   Hi I'm your husband when are you coming home

     i do not have a husband but i am on the way home. probably not to your home

1.17.18  12:47 am   how to stop being afraid of life???

     try it

1.17.18  12:46 am   are you planning on putting the songs you wrote after hotewig into an album?

     seems like anyone can just throw them into a folder, if that's how they prefer to organize them

1.17.18  12:46 am   how many questions are there?

     at least 2

1.17.18  12:39 am   Hey, I have no life. Where do I find one?

     check your pockets

1.17.18  12:37 am   why do you think humans need to express their emotions in such a complex manner?

     it's worth a try

1.17.18  12:35 am   where did i go wrong

     how do you know you went wrong

1.17.18  12:34 am   how have you thought of everything?

     i have not

1.17.18  12:34 am   is ur video about this and that and that and this and whatnot?

     some of my videos are about that

1.17.18  12:34 am   Great work on the new song and video! You mentioned putting off reality videos to work on that, do you intend to post some more now that it's finished?

     there's no time to do reality videos if i want to keep doing content for the videos and songs pages

1.17.18  12:33 am   Could you teach me how to draw a stick figure as fun as your stick figures

     you just gotta go into it ready to have a good time, not necessarily to draw what you thought you were gonna draw. like if you drew a phone instead, well, whoops. but that would be fun i think

1.17.18  12:32 am   Is that you singing in your video?

     yes

1.17.18  12:32 am   How do you feel about your La de da song reaching #1 on the Trending page in not a lot of time?

     nice, very good

1.17.18  12:30 am   Why do I always feel like I'm a bad person?

     because you are trying to make sure you are as good as possible

1.17.18  12:30 am   what did you dream about 

     being awake

1.17.18  12:19 am   Why don't you promote your patreon more?

     because asking for money is annoying

      I bet you'd get tons of patrons if people knew that the guy who made History of the Entire World, I guess... had a patreon.

     i already have tons of patrons, and i am looking forward to getting more tons in the future

1.17.18  12:18 am   i got stood up and am really disappointed, how do i move on

     it's actually very easy, just leave the venue. you have the rest of the day free

1.17.18  12:17 am   I think we all came here to earth to learn something. whether we wanted to or not.

     ah, #relatable

1.17.18  12:17 am   how long does it take to upload a song to spotify 

     about a day unless you spell it wrong the first time

1.17.18  12:15 am   How do you keep your answers so succinct?

     25,000 questions of practice

1.17.18  12:12 am   How much can you bench press

     i prefer to pull the bench

1.17.18  12:08 am   Favorite key signature? 

     which ever one best describes the music at hand

1.17.18  12:06 am   What do you think about robots? 

     they are nice
